oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effect of different mulches on yield, fruit quality and strawberry mite in organically grown strawberry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kivij채rvi, Pirjo
Parikka, P채ivi
Tuovinen, Tuomo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An organic strawberry field experiment was started in 2000 at MTT Ecological Production in Mikkeli to study the influence of mulching materials on the growth, yield, microbiological fruit quality and strawberry mite. Mulching materials are black plastic, flax fibre mat, green mass, barley straw, buckwheat husk as well as pine and birch woodchips.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kivij채rvi, Pirjo; Parikka, P채ivi and Tuovinen, Tuomo (2002) The effect of different mulches on yield, fruit quality and strawberry mite in organically grown strawberry. In: Organic production of fruit and berries, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists.
